forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds WSW at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
